course_description: Analysis of the international financial system and its effect on macroeconomic policies. Determination of exchange rates and their impact on the trade balance. International monetary institutions and proposals for reform.
prerequisites: (ECON 201 or ECON_OX 201) and (ECON 212 or ECON_OX  212) or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
